main event: A group of citizens in Sparta, Tennessee, observed an object resembling a star moving from northwest to southeast during the night of September 4, 1964.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 13 minutes,The object was seen at various positions above the horizon (up to 62 degrees),The observation was categorized as visual,The report concluded that the object was consistent with Satellite ECHO II,The investigation was initiated by staff support group and involved personal interviews.
